title: Amazon's huge device sale ends today: deals on Fire TV Stick, Kindle, tablets and more
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Score epic deals on Amazon's best-selling devices
article: Amazon's latest sale is blowing out its best-selling devices, including Fire TV Sticks, Blink security cameras, Fire tablets, Kindles, and more. You'll have to hurry though, these incredible device deals end today.

Some of our favorite bargains from Amazon's device sale include the Fire TV Stick Lite on sale for just $24.99, the outdoor Blink security camera marked down to $69.99 (was $99.99), and the Blink Mini security camera on sale for a record-low price of $24.99. If you're looking for tablet deals, Amazon has a first-time discount on the all-new Fire HD 10 tablet which is on sale for $99.99 (was $149.99), the Kindle Paperwhite marked down to an all-time low price of $79.99 (was $129.99), and the Fire 7 Kids Pro tablet on sale for a record-low price of $59.99 (was $99.99). See more of Amazon's best device deals below, and keep in mind, most of today's offers are record-low prices, and we probably won't see discounts like this until the upcoming Black Friday deals event. These epic Amazon deals end today, so you should take advantage now before it's too late.

See more of the best cheap TV deals and sales, and if you're looking for more tech bargains, you can see the best back to school sales from retailers like Best Buy, Walmart, and Amazon. You can also look forward to upcoming offers with our guide to the best Labor Day sales of 2021.
